name: Elementals (itch) (Vermeille)
description:
A small student project made in 3 months by a team of 6 people. The goal is to destroy all enemy  turrets, killing your enemy helps a lot because it grants you a charge to destroy a turret instantly. You can build new turrets on destroyed ones. It's like a mix between a dual stick shooter and a MOBA, but local (MLBA ?) and playable on a single screen with controllers (only, no keyboard controls). 

Controls : 

Left Stick : Movement

Right Stick : Shooting

A : Dash

B : Shield

X : Ball that deals damage depending on how far from the player you are

Y : Construct a turret on a free spot

Sometimes some magic totems spawn, if you destroy them you get a nice bonus until you die.
